name: Burgundy Sweatshirt
description:
Radicalstyle Sweaters are a piece of clothing that is inviting and offers a very snug feel. They are made out of 80% Cotton and 20% Polyester and are fleeced throughout to make the sweatshirt feel snug on the body. The ribbed collared crew neck offer a soft cotton faced fabric making the sweatshirt feel soft on you. Each sweatshirt is packaged in clear cellophane and is then shipped with stickers and other freebies. Royal Mail first class postage. Expect to receive your item in 1-4 business working days.

What others have to say... Posted by Jordan Martin - ✮✮✮✮✮ ' The product I ordered from you was really nice, material was good quality, nice and warm for winter, was delivered reasonably quickly, customer service is excellent and are very helpful '

name: Bottle Green Backpack
description:
The Crest backpack is a new introduction to the range and we feel that the addition of this product will enhance the way our customer shops with us. Its offers up to 18 Litres of capacity meaning you'll never struggle to fit your lecture books in again. It has a padded back panel for softness on your back, aswell as grab handle for easy portability. It is finished of with an circular embroided crest badge that is sewn onto the main compartment of the bag to give it our indentity. Royal Mail first class postage. Expect to receive your item in 1-4 business working days.

What others have to say... Posted by Jason Crosse - ✮✮✮✮✮ ' My Radical bag is extremely useful for general use. I use it for school work, sports and i store important work in there as well. It is very stylish as well. '

name: Burgundy Beanie
description:
These beanies offer brilliant stretch and a comforting feel on the head. The are made with 100% soft touch acrylic and finished off with high quality embroided patches with the 'Radicalstyle Logo'. Each beanie will come in clear cellophane packaging, along with stickers and other freebies. These items are great for keeping your head warm whilst out and about during these winter months.

Royal Mail first class postage. Expect to receive your item in 1-4 business working days.

name: Heather Crest Tshirt
description:
Our crest tshirt is a product that we are very proud to say is ours. Its offer excellent stretch throughout and with custom woven labels attached to the bottom of each tshirt, it very much feels like a premium product. Its is made out of 100% cotton which enable it to feel very soft on the body. These tshirts are a perfect addition to anybody's clothing collection. Royal Mail first class postage. Expect to receive your item in 1-4 business working days.

What others have to say... Posted by Scott Love - ✮✮✮✮✮ ' I bought the Crest T-Shirt from Radical Style and I have to say it is probably the comfiest t-shirt I have bought. They logo looks very professional on the t-shirt and the custom woven label makes it look better. The printed logo is printed on fine, it doesn't wrinkle or look cheap. The delivery of this item was rather quick. I got it in 3 days from ordering. The packaging of this item was great. '
Posted by Lucca Chadwick-Patel - ✮✮✮✮ ' So I purchased the Radical Style logo t shirt for a party. It came in time and it really pleased me. It was exact to the photo, the product was of nice quality and had professional printing. It was affordable and on the whole a good buy. One thing that could of improved it for me was having roll up sewn sleeves but other than that it really was a nice product '
